subtitle: chapter 13 hardly had mary uttered these
words when the whole sky became brighter
than the sun
a commanding peel of thunder shook
jerusalem to its foundation
then a terrific gale came from the west
driving at inky clouds whose bosom was
rent continually by shops of lightning
and rumbling of thunder the hurricane
almost threw us over into the court
in order not to be hurt we were
compelled to lie down flat on the roof
the whimples of the women were carried
away and the cloaks of the men were
lifted up and thrown back over their
shoulders
many struggled for light and air now the
storm broke off every one of them lilies
tearing them apart
a tongue of fire descended from the
heavens and ran in a circle around the
blessed mary
from that moment no one dared approach
her she alone stood upright her arms
stretched towards the sky
her eyes set her hair streaming shining
like the sun in the midst of the
darkness
the four archangels veiled their faces
with their wings
after a while mary turned her eyes
toward us and cried out
hurry hurry the hours come follow me
beloved apostles
then she turned around and fled down the
stairs into the court with the lightness
of a doe in spite of her ears
the fire danced around her she proceeded
gabrielle and michael preceded her with
raphael and uriel following after
being in a hurry many of the apostles
stumbled down the stairs because of the
darkness
as it happened since i was furthest from
the stairs when the hurricane hit
i was the last to leave the housetop i
stumbled over what a half hour ago had
been the bed of lilies fell down and
struck my head against the post of the
chair
of which mary had been sitting as i
tried to raise myself my hands grasped
one of the lilies
still half attached to its root and in
rising to my feet i pulled it up with my
hand
thinking to keep it as a memorial of the
blessed mary i placed the bud in the
pocket under my tunic
and have kept it since even to the
present day
chapter 14 the blessed mary went to the
mount of olives with the women following
her as the best they could
simon the zealot and philip assisted
mary the mother of james and joseph
the clouds lowered and the road upward
led into the mist in which we would have
lost sight of mary but for the fire
that ever danced around her in the
circle and for raphael and uriel who
followed her
at first many of us lost the road in the
wet cloud and stumbled over the stones
and roots
but after a while the air cleared and
behold far above in the sky the stars
were shining
and the full moon was sinking towards
the west
beneath us were the clouds stretched out
like an infinite ocean
rent by lightning and belching thunder
while above us reigned eternal stillness
the cherubim who had listened all night
to the words of mary
already were here before us innumerable
hosts of them were camped on the clouds
as far as the eyes could see
and as we emerge from the cloudy mist
some of the chairmen back into us
sweetly
as if they had been waiting for us mary
led us to the very summit near bethany
from where the lord jesus himself had
ascended into heaven 40 days after his
resurrection
when she had reached the open ground she
turned towards the east
shading her eyes plainly awaiting
something as we watched the dawn began
to break
suddenly above the clouds appeared a
great and shining light
looking intently we began a discern host
of innumerable angels
with the lord jesus himself leading them
their bodies were a fire for they were
seraphim
when they had come close the lord jesus
beckoned to them that they should not
advance further
but he himself came forward and turning
to us all who fell on our faces
trembling
lifted up his hands and blessed us
bidding us to rise
when mary also would have worshipped he
raised her up and took her
in his arms resting her head on his
breast
when he touched the blessed mary she was
transfigured
her white hair turned dark brown once
more
her wrinkles disappeared into a fair
smooth skin
her face became creamy white as out of a
blooming maiden
the knots of her fingers passed away in
the frail and slender fingers of a girl
her garments clung to her and became new
again and once more she grew into the
slight figure she had been
when the archangel gabrielle first
announced to her that the holy spirit
should overshadow her
then she should bring forth a son called
jesus
as the blessed mary rested in the arms
of the lord she looked up into his face
with a smile
similar to that of the archangel
gabrielle's when he stooped down and
kissed her forehead
she blushed until her milk white cheeks
were as pink as a rose
the seraphim gathered into a circle
around them and us
they sang hymns and it's not proper to
reveal them
sounding like the russian of a mighty
wind through a forest when the trees are
bare
they sang praises to the father who has
loved man so much
when mary had gazed or failed at the
face of the lord jesus she turned tawn
towards us
smiled sweetly so that her eyes were
dazzled and she said
dear souls who have watched with me
during this last night of my stay on
earth
god will repay you your labor of love
and why not so near to the master
himself
i would grieve to be separated from you
o beautiful souls with whom i have lived
and loved these many years
but he the hand of the father will
protect you from all evil
and will bring you all home safe in the
end
and when she finishes she looked up
inquiringly at the face of the lord
jesus
who smiled not only his approval
chapter 15 still leaning on the breast
of jesus mary turned her full glance
upon us
stretched forth her shining maiden-like
hand over the circle of fire
that now danced merely as it surrounded
both of them and spoke again
dear family before i am removed forever
from among you
if you have anything to ask concerning
the mysteries of the kingdom speak
freely
that your hearts may be solid within you
and that you may preach the truth in the
light of knowledge
then james bonarz answered saying
blessed lady mary
please do not be offended that i ask for
the third time
shall not the souls who have once loved
each other ever meet again
in the dim distant future i would like
to believe it
but when you told us of your former
lives although the angel promised you
each time
that you should later meet the one whom
your soul had cherished
look you have loved a different man each
time
first abel then noah then khufu
then melchizedek later zarathustra
then siddhartha and socrates and now
even in this
last incarnation you didn't meet any of
these
sweet lady mary blessed of god heart of
the circle and fire of heaven
make this revelation plain to us comfort
our hearts at last
after uttering these words james bond
down to the ground
then mary laughed a low girlish laugh
and roguishly looked into the face of
jesus blushing again
till her milk white cheeks were grown
red as roses
then we saw jesus himself smile as
brightly as the noonday sun
he replied o slow of heart to believe
all that our blessed
mary has spoken o james my james
listen you apostles for the way of god
open your ears that you may understand
before abraham was i am when the blessed
mary bore me
i was not a stranger to her upon the
face of the earth
for in the past i too had lived and
loved suffered and rejoiced
beneath these beautiful skies listen it
was me she loved when i was called able
it was me she loved when men called my
adjourning soul
by the name of noah stronger than death
was mary's law for it was me she loved
when i was known as khufu
the pyramid pharaoh of mizrahim
look i am melchizedek the king of
righteousness to whom abraham brought
gifts
and he was glad to see my day look i am
zarathustra and siddhartha gautama the
buddha and i
socrates the peaceful
truly from righteousness to
righteousness from birth to birth from
death to death
over land and over sea has been the
light of my love for mary and mary's
love for me
it has drawn our journey souls together
not once nor twice but ever forevermore
for age upon age i have preached the
gospel of truth
not only to the few and vain jews but
also to those who sat in darkness in
times of ancient unknown
from the foundation of the world till
now
in the land of ur and in naharim
northwestern mesopotamia and in mizraim
and in canaan and in ashur assyria
and in the land of the river ganges
india and in the city of athens
my soul and that of his blessed mary
long have left behind the fires of lust
so this last time we could not meet his
husband and wife
no one then was found pure enough to
bring me into the world but she
the spotless soul who is mary who is ada
and yonah and ascent and margot
and perez dent and yesh torha and eunice
the spirit of the highest overshadowed
her that we should not be separated from
this last time upon earth
and not even though we were only as
mother and son and she brought me forth
and i might end my ages long labor and
enlighten the world about its sin
as abel first i taught peace and labor
as noah i warned man of the coming
working out of the law of god
as khufu i sanctioned the exercise of
power
for the enlightenment of the poor as
melchizedek i brought healing to the
sick and righteousness
to those who are far from truth as
xerathustra i taught the souls of men
that god is a consuming fire in his
spiritual nature
as gauntlet buddha i taught the
eightfold path of righteousness
which i as socrates deduced from the
travailing souls of the youth of athens
but finally as jesus i gave my very life
that he who should believe in me
by obeying my word should find the
narrow way that leads to eternal life
behold
mary his mind now is then with me she
sorrowed and rejoiced loved and lived
by my side her soul has left her sins
behind other places in
other ages till by my side in this last
life
she has now demonstrated the truth which
i preached
and now behold not even death can tear
apart our souls
no longer separate we are one with me
she shall leave this earth
whose lessons both of us have learned
forevermore with me
so shall rise to the sun there to behold
the face of glories and angels beyond
the glories and angels of earth
there with me we shall grow as we grow
here till
the revolution of god's own timing both
of us inseparable forevermore
shall sit down together at the right
hand of our father
no longer shall we perform as two souls
but as one
perfect at last and blessed forevermore
we shall be face to face heart to heart
knowledge to knowledge with the fire of
life whose glory is eternity whose
destiny is itself
hail souls of man we salute you mary and
i
hail we shall wait for you ahead you
whose destiny it is also to know
yourself
and to be united with us in god as one
hail gods in the flesh destined
divinities destined masters of angels
rulers of spirits our joy shall not be
full until you shall be one with us in
the future
hurry the course of this age hurry the
time appointed
live the regenerative life teach the
inexorable truth
spread the unpronounceable love
bring home with you to the face of our
father many brothers and sisters
just as we brought you here to show you
that you are our own
before the unfailing witness of the
eternal host of the cherubim and
seraphim
before the face of the four archangels
the blessed gabriel
the blessed michael the blessed raphael
the blessed uriel
the north the south the east and the
west of heaven
after jesus had uttered these words the
cherubim seraphin
and the four archangels worshipped
bringing forth a great hymn
such as no man had ever heard before nor
ever will again a harmony unutterable
an ocean of glory gabriel sang
none but the pure shall hear and the
host of innumerable angels saying
glory to god forever and ever amen
michael sang none but the truth shall
taste and the host of innumerable angels
saying
glory to god forever and ever amen
raphael sang none but the strong shall
see
and the host of innumerable angels
saying glory to god forever and ever
amen uriel saying
none but the kind shall know and the
host of innumerable angels saying
glory to god forever and ever amen
then the blessed four archangels and all
the cherubim seraphim together saying
glory to him who is perfect and whole
father
and lover and guardian of souls when the
angels had finished singing a great
peace came upon us all
lying prone on the ground so still that
we could hear the beating of our own
hearts
but when we looked up behold we were all
alone we looked into each other's face
the hot tears blinding us
but there was no one to comfort us we
called aloud jesus
mary homesick we wept for them and for
the sorrows we should know
before the day we should all meet again
in heaven
but no one answered us so we turned
homewards heavy at heart
losing each other in the midst of the
clouds that still hung over jerusalem
so much so that it grew dark about that
time
end of chapter end of the second book of
acts
you
